title: Geordie Shore's Chloe Ferry wears pink swimsuit on beach in Dubai
text:
She's newly single following her acrimonious spilt from Sam Gowland.

And, Chloe Ferry showed her ex-boyfriend what he's missing as she slipped her surgically enhanced assets into a plunging hot pink swimsuit for a photoshoot on the beach in Dubai, last week.

The Geordie Shore star, 24, had her voluptuous derriere on display in the thong design swimwear, with a member of the team applying fake tan to her every curve.

Wow! Chloe Ferry, 24, slipped her surgically enhanced assets into a plunging hot pink swimsuit for a photoshoot on the beach in Dubai, last week

Chloe flaunted her curves in the skimpy hot pink swimwear, and accessorised with a coordinating wrist band and range of sunglasses for different shots.

Her platinum hair extensions were styled into dishevelled waves and sported a heavy make-up look complete with false eyelashes and over-lined lips.

Chloe - a self-confessed lover of plastic surgery - was sure to show off all her best bits in the scanty attire which was shiny and stretched across her chest.

Adding to the glam look was some of her tattoo collection, complete with inkings on her thigh and foot.

Preened to perfection: The Geordie Shore star had her voluptuous derriere on display in the thong design, with a member of the team applying fake tan to her every curve

Work it: Chloe flaunted her curves in the skimpy hot pink swimwear

Poser: Chloe lay on the beach beside the bottle of fake tan and a range of sunglasses

Reach for the stars: Chloe lifted her arms up high as an assistant ensured her behind was covered in fake tan

Beach babe: Her platinum hair extensions were styled into dishevelled waves

Glam: Chloe sported a heavy make-up look complete with false eyelashes and over-lined lips

Her co-star Sam proved he's moved on his ex for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies.

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when the duo appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

Glam: Chloe sported a heavy make-up look complete with false eyelashes and over-lined lips

Fierce: The Geordie Shore babe stood confidently on the sand while being preened for snaps

Lazy days: She accessorised with a hot pink wrist band and range of sunglasses

Don't miss a spot: The assistant used her bare hands to blend fake tan into Chloe's body

Ready for her close up: Chloe lay close to the water's edge during the photoshoot

Finishing touches: The platinum star stood in the skimpy swimwear while she had more fake tan applied to her skin

At the time, the star was furious with his ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now. I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.
